summation_rule: Income categories typically have credit balances (negative in the trial balance). Convert these to positive values for presentation in the final notes. Sum algebraically: Sales - Returns - Discounts.
additional_instructions: This note captures revenue from sale of traded goods. The calculation should be: Gross Sales (GL 5000/00000) less Return Inwards (GL 5010/00000) less Discount Allowed (GL 5020/00000). All these GLs have the same Ind AS Minor 'Sale of products'. Present the net amount as positive value in the final note.
